subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we will help you fight out the cash crunch
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$427,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://bathaeonand.com/
